package.name: Full Package
package.shortDescription: Control Centre and other media controls for Stencil theme, removed from latest (ios11) version

descriptionlist.description: Control Centre and other media controls for Stencil theme, removed from latest (ios11) version. Activate with Anemone.
Won't do anything on iOS above 10.3.3!

changelog.change: Initial solo release of elements originally in Stencil theme
